tags: None
review:
I do not have enough words to thank Dr Sridhar G . People are not wrong when they say doctors are next to god. 
Last 4 months i was running with series of tests and visits to different doctors including specialists. In addition got my wrong chest X ray report from one of the reputed lab. I was terrified. and was under lot of stress. Was taking all sorts of medicines.

Luckily before going for any procedure, i happen to meet Dr Sridhar. 
After talking to him half my stress vanished (though i had symptoms on upper stomach n left chest /ribs). He prescribed only one safest medicine  and just  few day i am completely normal.

He is the best doctor i saw in my last almost 50 years. Even after full busy day, the way he was talking n checking every small details from all the reports with so much patience, calm, relaxed mood and encouraging words. It was such a pleasure to meet such doctor.

I Thank him so so much for everything. 
This is just a small appreciation note with regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been consulting him for my Mother's BP and High Cholesterol from 7 years.One of the best Doctor I have come across.He has lotts of patience and Very down to Earth.Just by meeting him you will feel relaxed.

tags: None
review: My wife had visited the hospital and it was health problem. ****** *** ***** his communication and suggestion were good. I can surely recommend doctor to others.  Echo test, ECG was done. There was waiting time in the hospital when we went, it was for 30 minutes. My wife had a hole in her heart 6 years back. Echo was pending to do so we taught to check.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: not satisfied, we had been there for my mom who had heart surgery he only asked is pain there is it more n do u have heart attack symptoms. * **** ****** *** *** *** **** ** *******

tags: None
review: ** ** *** **** ** *********** His patience and detail explanation about the problems helps us to understand the problem better.  He suggested not to do angiogram after seeing my dad as he predicted he doesn’t have blockage but as a precaution I insisted to take angiogram but the results showed no blockage.  I have shown my father to almost 10 plus cardiologists but the confidence I got from doctor Sreedhar is unmatchable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Was a pleasant experience. Very down to earth. Explained the risk factors and how to go about handling the issues. Very friendly and reassuring. Came back home a little more confident

tags: None
review: I consulted him only once. It was an excellent experience. He examined well and explained the condition thoroughly. I got immediate consultation too. Everything was carried out smoothly. I will recommend the doctor with high regard.

tags: None
review: Visited him for cardiac health check up. His guidance and treatment were helpful. I am very happy with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: keen interest to treat, deep probing, patient hearing, always with smiling face, never arrogant, excellent knowledge, humble and what more to add - a perfect doctor, rare to find. I strongly recommend him to one and all.
